fulltext:
TRẦN QUANG THIỆN 
kuangthien@gmail.com  
84 (0) 981 341 850 
linkedin.com/in/kuangthien 
github.com/kuangthien 
SUMMARY 
A 9-years-experienced front-end developer specializing in (x)HTML, (S)CSS and ReactJS with the 
ability of working in an international team. 
A good team player in a cross-functional Agile team, comfortable to perform in Large-Scale Scrum 
(LeSS) framework as well as Scrum of Scrums (SoS) framework. 
Having a keen eye for details and  a passion of asking WHY questions. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCES 
June 2016 to present 
more than 3 years 
Senior Front-end Developer 
FPT Software (HCM city, Vietnam) – www.fpt-software.com  
Vietnam’s largest and one of the fastest growing software outsourcing 
companies 
- Develop single page applications using HTML/SCSS and ReactJS 
- Develop training documents for team members 
- Experienced of working in Agile environment 
Technologies 
ReactJs / Redux / React Router 
Webpack / SCSS/ CSS in JS  
JAMstack / NodeJs Serverless function ... 
Projects  Products  Clients 
2019 Robo Advisor 
Additiv Sg 
2018 Personal Loan App 
Customer Service Center 
App 
TymeBank Digital 
2017 Internet Banking App 
Personal Loan App 
Commonwealth Bank 
2016 Web Games - eMobiz 
Solution 
Massan, Prudential 
and Mondelez 
Live sites 
https://bank.tymedigital.co.za  
https://kta.commbank.co.id  
Dec 2015 to April 2016 
5 months 
Magento Front-end Developer 
SmartOsc Co., Ltd (Hanoi, Vietnam) – www.smartosc.com 
Premium, full service e-commerce agency for leading brands and e-tailers 
- Develop e-commerce websites using Magento 
- Develop POS solution - www.connectpos.com 
Jan 2013 to Sep 2015 
2 years 9 months 
Front-end Team Leader 
Sutunam Vietnam Co., Ltd (Hanoi, Vietnam) – www.sutunam.com 
A very young French start-up in digital media 
- Daily deal with CMS open sources such as Symfony, Magento and 
Wordpress  
- Fluent in HTML/CSS/SCSS, jQuery and responsive design 
25 projects: cresus.fr, trolleydeslumieres.com, MyScooterama.com, 
diary.club75.fr, tableinbox.com, chocolaterieonline.com, artgato. com, 
sabeko.fr, boutique-plus.com, Sportroops Mobile App, … 
Feb 2012 to present 
3 years and more 
Web Freelancer 
Self-employed (Hanoi, Vietnam) - www.kuangthien.com  
- Design web interfaces: be.net/kuangthien 
- Develop and maintain websites for online campaigns 
- Optimize SEO on-site and consult online strategies for SME 
- Convert PSD designs to HTML documents/ HTML Emails  
17 projects: tap4offers.co.uk, recruit.net, ivivu.com, m.vtc.vn, 
vietnamidol.com.vn , mtvvietnam.com.vn, expertrans.com, … 
Jul 2010 – Sep 2011 
1 year 2 month 
x)HTML/CSS Developer 
SmartOsc Co., Ltd (Hanoi, Vietnam) - www.smartosc.com 
Top leading Magento Solution Partner in Asia  
- Convert PSD designs into Magento templates and cross browser 
- Convert designs of email campaign to HTML Emails for 80spurple.com, 
jackjones.com…  
- Study and implement SEO, email marketing strategies in e-marketing 
team 
15 projects: 80spurple.com, joshsfrogs.com, smartosc.com, 
nongsanngon.com,... 
EDUCATION BACKGROUND 
FPT School of Business - FPT University  
Mini-MBA Certificate – 2014 
Hanoi Aptech Education Center, Vietnam  
Higher Diploma in Software Engineering (HDSE – ACCP 2008) 
SKILLS 
Technologies 
HTML, CSS/SCSS, Javascript 
Knowledge 
OOP, RDBMS and GIT/SVN 
Foreign Languages  
English communication and French basic 
Soft Skills 
Working in group and leadership 
REFERENCES

Head of Marketing 
MTV Vietnam- www.mtvvietnam.com.vn
